data.title: add a "mute" button to temporarily disable a track into the AnimationPlayer editor
data.body:
Hi!

It would be cool if it was possible to mute (temporarily disable) tracks into the AnimationPlayer editor.

data.title: Tilemap - inverse tiles for Left&Right
data.body:
Hey,I just started making my first game in Godot.I made a Tiledmap and assign a tileset.But it seems like some objects are flipped.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7363306/5558138/49c23ad2-8d23-11e4-9acb-aa28f113b26f.png)

Look at the image I selected and how it`s displayed.I`d fix it myself but i cant find the source file for this issue.

P.S: If anyone knows how to fix this please leave me the file from the .cpp file so I can learn more about godot.Thanks!

data.title: OS X & iOS: fixed_materials demo issue with mesh texture and color
data.body:
The diffuse texture in the mesh material doesn’t show up on the spheres in both the editor and the desktop player, but it’s showing ok on the device

The diffuse color in the mesh material is showing on the editor but not on the desktop player nor the device

The desktop runs OS X Yosemite (version 10.10.1) and the device runs iOS 7 (version 7.1.2)

![screen-shot-2014-12-26-at-6 18 24-am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1840524/5557483/bfdcd3e6-8cd1-11e4-9d91-8f7be620e7f1.jpg)

data.title: function _integrate_forcres dosn't work
[Forum] Faulty e-mail address validation.
data.body:
phpBB’s address validation is faulty. The specification for e-mail addresses does not limit the name part (before the @) in any way.

Google supports “+” in e-mail addresses, to add anything one likes to the name. E.g. as a marker, to use a different address on every login, and see where senders got the address from.

But phpBB blocks this, and probably limits the allowed characters in other pointless ways.

Could you just change the regular expression in there to allow any character before the “@”?

data.title: Error in 3d kinematic_char demo: Index p_shape_idx out of size
data.body:
The demo runs ok, but the log shows:

```
[1;31;40mERROR: create: [1;37;40mCondition ' !create_func ' is true. returned: 0

[0;31;40m   At: scene/3d/collision_object.cpp:322.[0;0;37m

[1;31;40mERROR: is_shape_set_as_trigger: [1;37;40mIndex p_shape_idx out of size (shapes.size()).
[0;31;40m   At: scene/3d/collision_object.cpp:322.[0;0;37m
[1;31;40mERROR: is_shape_set_as_trigger: [1;37;40mIndex p_shape_idx out of size (shapes.size()).
[0;31;40m   At: scene/3d/collision_object.cpp:322.[0;0;37m
[1;31;40mERROR: is_shape_set_as_trigger: [1;37;40mIndex p_shape_idx out of size (shapes.size()).
[0;31;40m   At: scene/3d/collision_object.cpp:322.[0;0;37m
[1;31;40mERROR: is_shape_set_as_trigger: [1;37;40mIndex p_shape_idx out of size (shapes.size()).
[0;31;40m   At: scene/3d/collision_object.cpp:322.[0;0;37m
[1;31;40mERROR: is_shape_set_as_trigger: [1;37;40mIndex p_shape_idx out of size (shapes.size()).
```

It seems to be triggered when the kinematic character collides with other objects.

data.title: Font hadn't change in new opened gd script
data.body:
I used custom font in editor (Settings->Editor Settings->Globals->Font)

When I open a new gd script file it not my custom font.

data.title: Texture not repeated
data.body:
when i am imported scene from blender, the texture is not repeated :(
![untitled](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10296472/5554062/5b6bfe84-8c70-11e4-91db-f51063407a3c.jpg)
![untitled1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10296472/5554061/5b125ff0-8c70-11e4-9834-c7f5483a9c5c.jpg)

data.title: Pr-reduce-android-build-size
data.body:
Reduce android build size(-fvisibility=hidden)
Fix gridmap link error when disable_3d=Yes

This reduce android runtime size from 17MB -> 14MB(release with debuginfo)

data.title: Default Light property Visible should be On
data.body: It seems counter-intuitive to add a light to a scene and then not see it's affect on the scene immediately.  The property under Spatial->Visiblility->Visible should default to On.

data.title: Values of the exported properties are not updated during animation
data.body:
Using an exported Vector2D as a track in the animation.
While other tracked values, such as frame, are updated and change during the animation, the exported Vector2D's value remains the same, and invalid.

data.title: Collision shape cannot be used as a track in the animation editor
data.body:
I have an animation which has tracks such as CollisionShape2D:shape:height. In the animation player, the height changes just fine, and I get no errors/warnings.

When I play the animation in the editor, I only get

```
ERROR: get_current_animation_pos: Condition ' !playback.current.from ' is true. returned: 0
   At: scene/animation/animation_player.cpp:1039.
```

and the height of the collision shape changes properly (I don't know what this error is supposed be).

When I start the game though, I get

```
ERROR: get_node: Node not found: CollisionShape2D:shape:height
   At: scene/main/node.cpp:828.
ERROR: _generate_node_caches: On Animation: 'stand', couldn't resolve track:  'CollisionShape2D:shape:height'
   At: scene/animation/animation_player.cpp:250.
ERROR: get_node: Node not found: CollisionShape2D:transform/pos
   At: scene/main/node.cpp:828.
ERROR: _generate_node_caches: On Animation: 'stand', couldn't resolve track:  'CollisionShape2D:transform/pos'
   At: scene/animation/animation_player.cpp:250.
ERROR: get_node: Node not found: CollisionShape2D:shape:height
   At: scene/main/node.cpp:828.
ERROR: _generate_node_caches: On Animation: 'walk', couldn't resolve track:  'CollisionShape2D:shape:height'
   At: scene/animation/animation_player.cpp:250.
ERROR: get_node: Node not found: CollisionShape2D:transform/pos
   At: scene/main/node.cpp:828.
ERROR: _generate_node_caches: On Animation: 'walk', couldn't resolve track:  'CollisionShape2D:transform/pos'
   At: scene/animation/animation_player.cpp:250.
```

and I'm not sure if the heigh/pos are changed properly (probably not).
**Edit**: confirmed, they are not changed to the proper value when the scene is run.

I'm getting this only for "sub-properties" (the ones that involve '/'), others work fine.

data.title: rand_from_seed needs a cleanup
data.body:
As far @grabiller and I could work out from rand_from_seed in math_funcs.cpp, there are some inconsistencies in the function; among those:
- line 50 winds up being s = -2836*s/127773
- the condition in line 51 can never be true, therefore line 52 never executes

data.title: Fix documentation for randf
data.body: Verified that 0 and 1 are exclusive (given the algorithm in math_funcs.cpp); reflected that in the docs.

data.title: should be able to duplicate root node
data.body: We should be able to duplicate the root node, and have it added as a direct child of the root.

data.title: Using dictionary keys direcly in function call crashes the game
data.body:
The function findNearestTargetZombie() returns a dictionary that is properly filled with two non-null values.

When accessing the key directly in the function call to sendProjectile(), as in this example below, the game crashes without an error message (except Debug Process Stopped).

If I assign these two dictionary valus to two separate vars before using them, everything works fine.

```
            var targetZombieIntel = findNearestTargetZombie()

            if (targetZombieIntel["targetZombie"] != null):
                sendProjectile(currentWeapon, targetZombieIntel["shortestDistance"])
```

The function returns a dictionary:

```
func findNearestTargetZombie():
    var heroPos = self.get_translation() + self.get_parent_spatial().get_translation()

    var targetZombie = null
    var shortestDistance = null

        # code for finding zombies

    var found = {"targetZombie": targetZombie, "shortestDistance": shortestDistance}
    return found
```

data.title: Code Completion Not Working for Sub-classes or Other Files
data.body:
OK, so it seems like code completion only works for built-in classes and types. If you define a sub-class in a GDScript file, you can't access that class's members or functions. Also, if you define anything in a GDScript file itself (using the file itself as the "class"), you won't be able to get any completion on its attributes. An example would be

```
const STATE_RELEASED = 3
```

in `input.gd`, and trying to use

```
var input = preload("res://input.gd").new()
```

to refer to the file. Printing out `input.STATE_RELEASED` works, but the completion displays nothing from the `input.gd` file.

data.title: Very different file sizes when saving the same scene multiple times
data.body: I have found a strange issue. When I do: Import->3D Scene->Import&Open and then Save Scene the file size of the .scn is about 115kB (in this sample case). Now, doing the same again: (Import->3D Scene->Import&Open then Save Scene) gives the .scn with size ~14MB. And again: 115kB... So every save I got small or big file...

data.title: iOS: shader_material demo with wrong screen size when the device orientation changes
data.body:
When the device orientation changes the image on the screen is scaled up on and iPod touch 5g running iOS 7.1.2

Then it gets back to the right size, but each time the camera passes in from of the object with the shader material the image is scaled up again, just to return to the right size after those objects are no longer in front of the camera

data.title: Ui lag in linux
data.body:
I downloaded stable 32 bit version from official download page.

Opened the the editor. All tabs, buttons, all ui are unresponsive(or lag).

System(laptop):
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
Pentium Dual Core T4200 ~2GHz
2GB RAM
Chipset GM45 Express

*changing the godot process to very high didn't give any result, still same
*CPU usage is low

data.title: added set_verify_mode .
data.body: Added a way to config verify_mode .

data.title: extremal cpu usage, when model have bones
data.body:
model have no bones - 1% cpu usage
add bone to model (without animation) - 100% cpu usage

(when exported from bleder)

data.title: code completion display glitch
data.body:
When:
1. An identifier ends with a capital `Y` or `W`, and 
2. The code completion list contains no larger items, 

The code completion list will omit the final character.
![completion_pop-up](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1151394/5535475/3b5db41e-8aba-11e4-957f-3a38db5000a0.png)

data.title: extending code completion
data.body:
First of all congratulations on the recent improvements to code completion, it really helps make GDScript shine!

I have noticed a couple of places where improvements may be possible.
1. after typing "`func`" it would be helpful to list any functions belonging to the parent class to assist those times that we want to override.
2. When calling a function with a known parameter type it could suggest  the constructor for that type and local or member variables of that type.
3. Input Action names could be suggested for `input.is_action_pressed()`

As with any interface decisions, opinions will vary, this is just my two cents.

Thank you for all your hard work.

data.title: HELP!collision detection dosn‘t work
data.body:
I set a rigidbody2d node like
-rigidbody2d
--anim
--sprite
--collisionShape2D
--Area2D
---collisionPolygon2D
the collisionShape2D is in the collisionPolygon2D
when other staticBody2D collide with rigidbody then game over but i can't get signal from area2D.
the collisionShape2D is in the collisionPolygon2D and smaller then it.
rigidbody2d has script:
func _ready():
        get_node("Area2D").connect("body_enter_shape",self,"dead")
func dead( body_id, body, body_shape, area_shape ):
    print(body)

sorry for my poor english, you can get my code at :https://github.com/lengyue524/godot-flappybird.git

data.title: minor UI polish: should be able to click and drag to re-order tabs
data.body: you should be able to click and drag to re-order tabs.

data.title: exporting resources in project should include .flags files
data.body: if you have selected the option to export resources in the project, and you've set texture flags via the .flags files, they will be excluded when you export your project. Those should be considered part of the project resource files.

data.title: Godot freezes Ubuntu Gnome during startup
data.body:
Concerns: Godot 1.0 stable, Ubuntu 12.04

It happens about every 10th time I start Godot.
The Godot window displays the Godot face on white background and doesn't continue. Gnome is then frozen and won't react to any input. I can switch to another terminal, kill Godot, but that doesn't help.
I have to kill gnome-session and restart all applications to get back to work.

Is there a log I can attach or activate?

Btw. this has always happened, since I started using Godot. Not a new problem.

data.title: Array needs a shuffle() method
data.body:
We should be able to shuffle or randomize an Array by calling Array.shuffle(). 
Would also be good for many uses. Would also be handy to do things like:

for enemy in get_node("enemies").get_children().shuffle():

(get_children() returns an Array, so this should work.)

If such functionality already exists, I couldn't find it, and I also couldn't figure out how to use sort_custom() and couldn't find any documentation on it either.
